name: Synchronous Server Calls
filter_prompt: The code snippet implements, references, or uses synchronous server calls (e.g., blocking network requests, synchronous HTTP APIs, or RPCs that block the main thread).

name: Long Method Detection
filter_prompt: The code snippet contains methods or functions that are unusually long, indicating a need for refactoring into smaller, more manageable units.

name: Duplicated Code Patterns
filter_prompt: The code snippet contains duplicated code blocks or patterns that could be refactored into reusable functions or classes.

name: Deeply Nested Conditionals
filter_prompt: The code snippet contains deeply nested if/else or switch/case statements.

name: God Object or Large Class
filter_prompt: The code snippet defines a class or object that has too many responsibilities or methods.
